top.title: Italy investigates claim that tourists paid to go to Bosnia to kill besieged civilians
top.summary: Italians and others are alleged to have paid large sums to fire at Bosnians risking their lives in besieged Sarajevo.

top.title: Major corruption scandal engulfs top Zelensky allies
top.summary: The Ukrainian president has called for the justice and energy ministers to be removed from their posts.

top.title: Israeli settlers set fire to Palestinian warehouse and land as West Bank attacks surge
top.summary: Several Palestinians were also injured when settlers launched arson attacks targeting an industrial area, a Bedouin village, and farmland east of Tulkarm.

top.title: £220 ‘for a cut-up sock' - Apple's new iPhone Pocket ridiculed online
top.summary: Many took aim at the high price online, while others made fun of its striking likeness to a piece of footwear.

top.title: Danish man given suspended sentence for sharing nude film scenes on Reddit
top.summary: Police said the man shared 347 clips of naked actors on the social media site, which were viewed 4.2 million times.

top.title: New consoles used to come out every five years – so where's the PlayStation 6?
top.summary: On the fifth anniversary of the PlayStation 5, the firm says its focus remains on its current console.

title.#text: Valve has stopped manufacturing its Index VR headset
Valve has no news about Steam Deck 2
We tried Valve’s new VR headset, PC, and controller — ask us anything!
